title: Premium Block of Land with a Colonial Bungalow for Sale
details:
This is a premium property located only 1.10Km away from the Galle Road on a busy road in Panadura which house the Hospital,St Johns Girls School & the Ploice Station.

The Colonial Bungalow comes with following features:-

* 4 Bedrooms
* 3 Bathrooms
* Servants Quarters
* Kitchen
* Solar HW
* Garage
* Lots of Coconut/King Coconut & Fruit Trees

Land Extent :- 80 Perches
Floor Area :- Above 3,000sqft
The Road Frontage:- 90 feet.

The property is ideal to be developed as an Elders Home or to build an apartment complex.

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 55 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS WILL BE ENTERTAINED
